reviews.review: No, hay motivos por los cuales no jugarlo, yo lo recomiendo si vas a jugar con amigos si no no, pero bueno, es una opinion propia, es un juego gratis actualmente, asique si tenes dudas mejor probalo por vos mismo
Would recommend, if you are into cheating OR you like to lag and have hitreg issues!

Super cancerous but in a solid heartwarming way. Makes me wish i could die ten times over while asphyxiating myself. Instal, create a discord with four or more of your bestfriends, and then commence wasting your life in a competitive manner that you will regret and reminisce at the same time.
you go pew pew and then i go pew pew. 10/10 recommend
